# primaryConstituentDeviceRestrictedSwitchingBehaviorConditionsForRecording

**Instance Property**

The conditions during which camera switching may occur while recording.

## Declaration

```swift
var primaryConstituentDeviceRestrictedSwitchingBehaviorConditionsForRecording: AVCaptureDevice.PrimaryConstituentDeviceRestrictedSwitchingBehaviorConditions { get }
```

## Discussion

The default conditions include [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/PrimaryConstituentDeviceRestrictedSwitchingBehaviorConditions-swift.struct/videoZoomChanged], [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/PrimaryConstituentDeviceRestrictedSwitchingBehaviorConditions-swift.struct/focusModeChanged], and [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/PrimaryConstituentDeviceRestrictedSwitchingBehaviorConditions-swift.struct/exposureModeChanged].

This property is key-value observable.

## Restricting camera switching

- **isPrimaryConstituentDeviceSwitchingBehaviorForRecordingEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to restrict constituent device switching behavior during recording.
- **setPrimaryConstituentDeviceSwitchingBehaviorForRecording(_:restrictedSwitchingBehaviorConditions:)**: Sets the camera switching behavior to use during recording.
- **primaryConstituentDeviceSwitchingBehaviorForRecording**: The camera switching behavior to use for recording.
